typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ParquetSingleFile
ParquetSingleFile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 25),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParquetSplitted
